li.text:
Valkyries rarely spawn and join a settlement. However, one Valkyrie is worth a dozen regular settlers.

Valkyries become stronger with age, at the moment they will reach their maximum strength by the age of 20. The ages at which Valkyries improve are 13, 16, 18, 20. Very young Valkyries (below 13) get a debuff to defense, hunger, HP, and damage dealt. Valkyries from 13 to 16 have no debuffs. Balance takes into account mutations.

Info:
- Valkyries do not display their heads when they are sleeping. This is not a bug, according to the logic of the game, they have no heads.
- There is a built-in autopatcher that adds all types of clothing, without texture (invisible when put on), to the whitelist.
- All girls spawn in the pool of the Valkyries faction, they do not have separate factions.

li.label: Enable wanderer event
li.tooltip: Unlocks the event. The event chance is configured in the "General" tab.
